name: Erstream
overview: Erstream is a technology, software and service company that was founded in 2001 in Istanbul and provides high quality IP-streaming services that include CDN, encoding, 24/7 monitoring, maintenance and support. Encoding is processed by our own encoder that have been developed by one of our outstanding software department. We are supplying best video quality in every possible kind of format. Moreover, we provide service, encoding and support for VOD and live systems and our program is capable to cover live streaming of many live events, especially in a sport field. Our young team is ready to grant assistance in video portal development and design, along with image recognition systems for advertisement agencies. We have broad experience in IP-boxes design and content fulfillment. Last, but not least Erstream is a representative and exclusive reseller of the proven leader for high quality, large scale, and cost effective Internet media delivery company Octoshape in such countries as Turkey, Bulgaria, Georgia, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Turkmenistan and Iraq.
